text:
@toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock Are we sure sufficient effort has been put in at the sharp end?  
Enough turning up to be tested?
Activists sabotaging test regimen? 

There's been a lot of NHS staff outed as lying anti-Government activists already. A few screwing up testing for political point is a possibility.
